00045 
00046 GHOST_DropTargetWin32::GHOST_DropTargetWin32(GHOST_WindowWin32 * window, GHOST_SystemWin32 * system)
00047 :
00048 m_window(window),
00049 m_system(system)
00050 {
00051     m_cRef = 1;
00052     m_hWnd = window->getHWND();
00053     m_draggedObjectType = GHOST_kDragnDropTypeUnknown;
00054     
00055     // register our window as drop target
00056     ::RegisterDragDrop(m_hWnd, this);
00057 }
00058 
00059 GHOST_DropTargetWin32::~GHOST_DropTargetWin32()
00060 {
00061     ::RevokeDragDrop(m_hWnd);
00062 }
00063

00065 /* 
00066  *  IUnknown::QueryInterface
00067  */
00068 HRESULT __stdcall GHOST_DropTargetWin32::QueryInterface (REFIID riid, void ** ppvObj)
00069 {
00070 
00071     if (!ppvObj)
00072         return E_INVALIDARG;
00073     *ppvObj = NULL;
00074 
00075     if(riid == IID_IUnknown || riid == IID_IDropTarget)
00076     {
00077         AddRef();
00078         *ppvObj = (void*)this;
00079         return S_OK;
00080     }
00081     else
00082     {
00083         *ppvObj = 0;
00084         return E_NOINTERFACE;
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 /* 
00090  *  IUnknown::AddRef 
00091  */
00092 
00093 ULONG __stdcall GHOST_DropTargetWin32::AddRef(void)
00094 {
00095     return ::InterlockedIncrement(&m_cRef);
00096 }
00097 
00098 /* 
00099  * IUnknown::Release
00100  */
00101 ULONG __stdcall GHOST_DropTargetWin32::Release(void)
00102 {
00103     ULONG refs = ::InterlockedDecrement(&m_cRef);
00104         
00105     if(refs == 0)
00106     {
00107         delete this;
00108         return 0;
00109     }
00110     else
00111     {
00112         return refs;
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 /* 
00117  * Implementation of IDropTarget::DragEnter
00118  */
00119 HRESULT __stdcall GHOST_DropTargetWin32::DragEnter(IDataObject * pDataObject, DWORD grfKeyState, POINTL pt, DWORD * pdwEffect)
00120 {
00121     // we accept all drop by default
00122     m_window->setAcceptDragOperation(true);
00123     *pdwEffect = DROPEFFECT_NONE;
00124     
00125     m_draggedObjectType = getGhostType(pDataObject);
00126     m_system->pushDragDropEvent(GHOST_kEventDraggingEntered, m_draggedObjectType, m_window, pt.x, pt.y, NULL);
00127     return S_OK;
00128 }
00129 
00130 /* 
00131  * Implementation of IDropTarget::DragOver
00132  */
00133 HRESULT __stdcall GHOST_DropTargetWin32::DragOver(DWORD grfKeyState, POINTL pt, DWORD * pdwEffect)
00134 {
00135     if(m_window->canAcceptDragOperation())
00136     {
00137         *pdwEffect = allowedDropEffect(*pdwEffect);
00138     }
00139     else
00140     {
00141         *pdwEffect = DROPEFFECT_NONE;
00142         //*pdwEffect = DROPEFFECT_COPY; // XXX Uncomment to test drop. Drop will not be called if pdwEffect == DROPEFFECT_NONE.
00143     }
00144     m_system->pushDragDropEvent(GHOST_kEventDraggingUpdated, m_draggedObjectType, m_window, pt.x, pt.y, NULL);
00145     return S_OK;
00146 }
00147 
00148 /* 
00149  * Implementation of IDropTarget::DragLeave
00150  */
00151 HRESULT __stdcall GHOST_DropTargetWin32::DragLeave(void)
00152 {
00153     m_system->pushDragDropEvent(GHOST_kEventDraggingExited, m_draggedObjectType, m_window, 0, 0, NULL);
00154     m_draggedObjectType = GHOST_kDragnDropTypeUnknown;
00155     return S_OK;
00156 }
00157 
00158 /* Implementation of IDropTarget::Drop
00159  * This function will not be called if pdwEffect is set to DROPEFFECT_NONE in 
00160  * the implementation of IDropTarget::DragOver
00161  */
00162 HRESULT __stdcall GHOST_DropTargetWin32::Drop(IDataObject * pDataObject, DWORD grfKeyState, POINTL pt, DWORD * pdwEffect)
00163 {
00164     void * data = getGhostData(pDataObject);
00165     if(m_window->canAcceptDragOperation())
00166     {
00167         *pdwEffect = allowedDropEffect(*pdwEffect);
00168 
00169     }
00170     else
00171     {
00172         *pdwEffect = DROPEFFECT_NONE;
00173     }
00174     if (data)
00175         m_system->pushDragDropEvent(GHOST_kEventDraggingDropDone, m_draggedObjectType, m_window, pt.x, pt.y, data );
00176         
00177     m_draggedObjectType = GHOST_kDragnDropTypeUnknown;
00178     return S_OK;
00179 }
00180 
00181 /* 
00182  * Helpers
00183  */
00184  
00185 DWORD GHOST_DropTargetWin32::allowedDropEffect(DWORD dwAllowed)
00186 {
00187     DWORD dwEffect = DROPEFFECT_NONE;
00188     if(dwAllowed & DROPEFFECT_COPY) 
00189         dwEffect = DROPEFFECT_COPY;
00190 
00191     return dwEffect;
00192 }
00193 
00194 GHOST_TDragnDropTypes GHOST_DropTargetWin32::getGhostType(IDataObject * pDataObject)
00195 {
00196     /* Text
00197      * Note: Unicode text is aviable as CF_TEXT too, the system can do the 
00198      * conversion, but we do the conversion ourself with WC_NO_BEST_FIT_CHARS.
00199      */
00200     FORMATETC fmtetc = { CF_TEXT, 0, DVASPECT_CONTENT, -1, TYMED_HGLOBAL };
00201     if(pDataObject->QueryGetData(&fmtetc) == S_OK)
00202     {
00203         return GHOST_kDragnDropTypeString;
00204     }
00205 
00206     // Filesnames
00207     fmtetc.cfFormat = CF_HDROP;
00208     if(pDataObject->QueryGetData(&fmtetc) == S_OK)
00209     {
00210         return GHOST_kDragnDropTypeFilenames;
00211     }
00212 
00213     return GHOST_kDragnDropTypeUnknown;
00214 }
00215 
00216 void * GHOST_DropTargetWin32::getGhostData(IDataObject * pDataObject)
00217 {
00218     GHOST_TDragnDropTypes type = getGhostType(pDataObject);
00219     switch(type)
00220     {
00221         case GHOST_kDragnDropTypeFilenames:
00222             return getDropDataAsFilenames(pDataObject);
00223             break;
00224         case GHOST_kDragnDropTypeString:
00225             return getDropDataAsString(pDataObject);
00226             break;
00227         case GHOST_kDragnDropTypeBitmap:
00228             //return getDropDataAsBitmap(pDataObject);
00229             break;
00230         default:
00231 #ifdef GHOST_DEBUG
00232             ::printf("\nGHOST_kDragnDropTypeUnknown");
00233 #endif // GHOST_DEBUG
00234             return NULL;
00235             break;
00236     }
00237     return NULL;
00238 }
00239 
00240 void * GHOST_DropTargetWin32::getDropDataAsFilenames(IDataObject * pDataObject)
00241 {
00242     UINT  totfiles, nvalid=0;
00243     WCHAR fpath [MAX_PATH]; 
00244     char * temp_path;
00245     GHOST_TStringArray *strArray = NULL;
00246     FORMATETC fmtetc = { CF_HDROP, 0, DVASPECT_CONTENT, -1, TYMED_HGLOBAL };
00247     STGMEDIUM stgmed;
00248     HDROP hdrop;
00249 
00250     // Check if dataobject supplies the format we want.
00251     // Double checking here, first in getGhostType.
00252     if(pDataObject->QueryGetData(&fmtetc) == S_OK)
00253     {
00254         if(pDataObject->GetData(&fmtetc, &stgmed) == S_OK)
00255         {
00256             hdrop = (HDROP)::GlobalLock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00257 
00258             totfiles = ::DragQueryFileW ( hdrop, -1, NULL, 0 );
00259             if (!totfiles)
00260             {
00261                 ::GlobalUnlock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00262                 return NULL;
00263             }
00264 
00265             strArray = (GHOST_TStringArray*) ::malloc(sizeof(GHOST_TStringArray));
00266             strArray->count = 0;
00267             strArray->strings = (GHOST_TUns8**) ::malloc(totfiles*sizeof(GHOST_TUns8*));
00268 
00269             for ( UINT nfile = 0; nfile < totfiles; nfile++ )
00270             {
00271                 if ( ::DragQueryFileW ( hdrop, nfile, fpath, MAX_PATH ) > 0 )
00272                 {
00273                     if ( !(temp_path = alloc_utf_8_from_16(fpath, 0)) )
00274                     {
00275                         continue;
00276                     } 
00277                     // Just ignore paths that could not be converted verbatim.
00278 
00279                     strArray->strings[nvalid] = (GHOST_TUns8*) temp_path;
00280                     strArray->count = nvalid+1;
00281                     nvalid++;
00282                 }
00283             }
00284             // Free up memory.
00285             ::GlobalUnlock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00286             ::ReleaseStgMedium(&stgmed);
00287             
00288             return strArray;
00289         }
00290     }
00291     return NULL;
00292 }
00293 
00294 void * GHOST_DropTargetWin32::getDropDataAsString(IDataObject * pDataObject)
00295 {
00296     char* tmp_string;
00297     FORMATETC fmtetc = { CF_UNICODETEXT, 0, DVASPECT_CONTENT, -1, TYMED_HGLOBAL };
00298     STGMEDIUM stgmed;
00299 
00300     // Try unicode first.
00301     // Check if dataobject supplies the format we want.
00302     if(pDataObject->QueryGetData(&fmtetc) == S_OK)
00303     {
00304         if(pDataObject->GetData(&fmtetc, &stgmed) == S_OK)
00305         {
00306             LPCWSTR wstr = (LPCWSTR)::GlobalLock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00307             if ( !(tmp_string = alloc_utf_8_from_16((wchar_t*)wstr, 0)) )
00308             {
00309                 ::GlobalUnlock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00310                 return NULL;
00311             }
00312             // Free memory
00313             ::GlobalUnlock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00314             ::ReleaseStgMedium(&stgmed);
00315 #ifdef GHOST_DEBUG
00316             ::printf("\n<converted droped unicode string>\n%s\n</droped converted unicode string>\n",tmp_string);
00317 #endif // GHOST_DEBUG
00318             return tmp_string;
00319         }
00320     }
00321 
00322     fmtetc.cfFormat = CF_TEXT;
00323 
00324     if(pDataObject->QueryGetData(&fmtetc) == S_OK)
00325     {
00326         if(pDataObject->GetData(&fmtetc, &stgmed) == S_OK)
00327         {
00328             char * str = (char*)::GlobalLock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00329             
00330             tmp_string = (char*)::malloc(::strlen(str)+1);
00331             if ( !tmp_string )
00332             {
00333                 ::GlobalUnlock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00334                 return NULL;
00335             }
00336 
00337             if ( !::strcpy(tmp_string, str) )
00338             {
00339                 ::free(tmp_string);
00340                 ::GlobalUnlock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00341                 return NULL;
00342             }
00343             // Free memory
00344             ::GlobalUnlock(stgmed.hGlobal);
00345             ::ReleaseStgMedium(&stgmed);
00346 
00347             return tmp_string;
00348         }
00349     }
00350     
00351     return NULL;
00352 }
00353 
00354 int GHOST_DropTargetWin32::WideCharToANSI(LPCWSTR in, char * &out)
00355 {
00356     int size;
00357     out = NULL; //caller should free if != NULL
00358 
00359     // Get the required size.
00360     size = ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_ACP,        //System Default Codepage
00361                                 0x00000400,     // WC_NO_BEST_FIT_CHARS
00362                                 in,
00363                                 -1,             //-1 null terminated, makes output null terminated too.
00364                                 NULL,
00365                                 0,
00366                                 NULL,NULL
00367             );
00368     
00369     if(!size) 
00370     {
00371 #ifdef GHOST_DEBUG
00372         ::printLastError();
00373 #endif // GHOST_DEBUG
00374         return 0;
00375     }
00376 
00377     out = (char*)::malloc(size);
00378     if (!out)
00379     {
00380         ::printf("\nmalloc failed!!!");
00381         return 0;
00382     }
00383 
00384     size = ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_ACP,
00385                                 0x00000400,
00386                                 in,
00387                                 -1,
00388                                 (LPSTR) out,
00389                                 size,
00390                                 NULL,NULL
00391             );
00392 
00393     if(!size)
00394     {
00395 #ifdef GHOST_DEBUG
00396         ::printLastError();
00397 #endif //GHOST_DEBUG
00398         ::free(out);
00399         out = NULL;
00400     }
00401     return size;
00402 }
00403 
00404 #ifdef GHOST_DEBUG
00405 void printLastError(void)
00406 {
00407     LPTSTR s;
00408     DWORD err;
00409 
00410     err = GetLastError();
00411     if(FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_ALLOCATE_BUFFER |
00412         FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM,
00413         NULL,
00414         err,
00415         0,
00416         (LPTSTR)&s,
00417         0,
00418         NULL)
00419     )
00420     {
00421         printf("\nLastError: (%d) %s\n", (int)err, s);
00422         LocalFree(s);
00423     }
00424 }
00425 #endif // GHOST_DEBUG
